summary: I'm a recent graduate with a Bachelor's degree in International Business from Hogeschool van Arnhem en Nijmegen. I possess excellent English language proficiency (C1 Advanced) and have a deep understanding of the global macro-economic factors that drive international trade and business. I have gained valuable practical experience during my internships and living abroad, as well as independently working on various marketing projects. My expertise includes creating and managing digital campaigns, conducting research to develop strategies for improving online presence, designing and delivering presentations, monitoring analytics and insights for social media platforms, and managing PR activities. I am an enthusiastic and creative problem solver ready to take on new challenges.
